author: smartini
msg: add Web Start files for Stock Tracker demo, for the default language, and setting an explicit Locale (French).
Note that currently the language env. variable is read by the application, but is not used inside the application (when run under Web Start) ... needs further study.

author: jukka
msg: JCR-1438: Replace Config classes with factories
Use generics in BeanConfig.newInstance() to avoid the need of class casts.
Use the standard java.beans classes instead of BeanMap for the configured bean properties. This allows better control over value types.

author: gbrown
msg: Minor TextAreaSkin updates (temporarily remove deferred layout; this will be re-added in a future update).

author: smartini
msg: removed unnecessary tags, ignored at runtime (as seen in the Console)
